Text.Page: When we lost our flight platform, we constructed a series of improvised transport devices. Without those, we'd never risk leaving Kanstria.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"How do they work?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

They're not all that different from teleportals. Without the raw magical power to build a full-on teleportal network, we use {@RawItem:206811} to power them, and those aren't too hard to mine.

Head out to {@Rgn:49002} and acquire {@RawItem:206811}. I hope you're proficient at mining."I've cracked a few rocks in my time."

Excellent. I'll meet you at the {@LinkCreature:249#1101}.

Good luck!

Good. You found it.

South of here is the {@Rgn:49002}. The argons use them to siphon energy from the fields. You'll need to mine {@RawItem:206811} from {@Collection:106} before you can use the platform.

Come find me again once you have it.

Now, use {@RawItem:206811} to activate the teleport platform.

I'll see you in Kanstria.
It's not easy to mine for {@RawItem:206811}, but it is easier when using the right equipment.

Well done!

The teleport platforms help us outmaneuver the argons. Pretty clever, don't you think?
